doc.name: childControlIDs
doc.summary: Reports the IDs of all the children of a group.

description.overview: Use the childControlIDs property to get a list of the short ids of all the direct children of a group
description.value:
The childControlIDs of a group reports a list of the short id properties of the direct children of a group.
This property is read-only and cannot be set.
description.comments: Each line of the childControlIDs is the short id of a control which is a direct child of the group, the property does not recurse into subgroups.
